import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Row, Col } from 'reactstrap' class Question extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) } setInputChecked(input) { document.querySelector('input[id={question1-1}]').checked = true } renderQuestion = ({ name, question }) => (
{question}
) render() { const { questions } = this.props return (
{questions.map(this.renderQuestion)}
) } } export default Question
